subproject.corporate outcome: Development plans and programmes integrate environmentally sustainable solutions in a manner that promotes poverty reduction, MDG achievement and low-emission climate-resilient development
subproject.description:
This project has 3 components:
1- Corporate Social Responsibilities promoted in Viet Nam through the local Global Compact network and policy advise
2- Corporate Social Responsibilities embedded in Viet Nam through Research, Training and Curiculum Development
3- Stakeholders engaged in partnerships within the Global Compact to advance the Millenium Development Goals
subproject.title: Corporate Social Responsibilit
